titleInfo.title: Untapped : creating value in underserved markets

mods.abstract: "Based on extensive research and featuring fifty case studies from leading corporations - including IBM, JPMorgan Chase, and Dreamworks - Untapped details the practical dos and don'ts every manager needs to know when approaching a new market. It shows how, by engaging consumers, workers, and suppliers, companies can create win-win partnerships with underserved communities. Corporations will discover and new source of increased sales, qualified workers, and marketable innovations as well as new ways to reduce costs and increase quality. The communities will get better products, more meaningful job opportunities, and an increased market for their own goods and services."--BOOK JACKET.
